C

Client - Class in model
Represents a client in the system.
Client(int, String, String, String, int, String) - Constructor for class model.Client
Constructs a new Client with specified details.
ClientBL - Class in business
Business logic class for managing client operations.
ClientBL(ClientDAO) - Constructor for class business.ClientBL
Constructs a ClientBL object with a specified ClientDAO.
ClientDAO - Class in data
Data Access Object specifically for handling database operations related to the Client entity.
ClientDAO() - Constructor for class data.ClientDAO
Constructs a ClientDAO for handling Client entities, initializing with the Client class type.
ClientValidator - Class in validator
The ClientValidator class is responsible for validating client operations, ensuring that a client exists before an operation is performed.
ClientValidator(ClientBL) - Constructor for class validator.ClientValidator
Constructs a ClientValidator with a reference to a business logic handler.
close(Connection) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
Closes the provided database connection.
close(ResultSet) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
Closes the provided ResultSet object.
close(Statement) - Static method in class connection.ConnectionFactory
Closes the provided Statement object.
connection - package connection
 
ConnectionFactory - Class in connection
Factory class for managing database connections.
Controller - Class in presentation
Controller for managing GUI interactions and delegating business logic operations.
Controller(View, ClientBL, ProductBL, OrderBL) - Constructor for class presentation.Controller
Constructs a Controller object with associated business logic handlers and a view.
createOrder(int, Client, Product, int) - Method in class business.OrderBL
Creates an order with the specified details, validates client, product, and quantity, and commits a transaction that includes updating product inventory, creating an order record, and generating a bill.
